st_remarks: We have two very different soil layers: one going from 0 to 60 cm depth (77.7% sand, 2.2% silt and 20.1% clay) and another one going from 0 to 100 cm (60.9% sand, 2.0% silt and 37.1% clay). I introduced the data of the first layer in the cells because itÂ´s where the roots are located mainly.
